title: Conan Gray, a Budding Pop Singer Who Feels It All
abstract: The 23-year-old who got his start on YouTube put out his first album in the early months of the coronavirus pandemic. Now he’s reintroducing himself with a new LP, “Superache.”

title: Margaret Keane, Painter of Sad-Eyed Waifs, Dies at 94
abstract: Her work was immensely popular and virtually ubiquitous. But until the matter was settled in court, her husband fraudulently claimed credit for it.

multimedia.caption: The artist Margaret Keane at work in her home studio in a photo taken for a 1965 article in Life magazine, with her husband, Walter, in the background. It was later revealed that he took credit for work that was actually hers.
multimedia.copyright: Photo by Bill Ray/The LIFE Picture Collection/Getty Images

title: Poisonous Gas Leak in Jordan Kills at Least 10 People

title: Sam Gilliam, Abstract Artist of Drape Paintings, Dies at 88
abstract: A brilliant colorist, he hung his canvases from ceilings in great curves and loops, or pinned them, gathered, to walls, taking his medium into three dimensions.

multimedia.caption: Sam Gilliam in 2018 at his studio in Washington, D.C. “My work is as political as it is formal,” he once said.
multimedia.copyright: Gabriella Demczuk for The New York Times

title: William Herschel Is Famous for Science. What About His Music?
abstract: The accomplished astronomer was, one historian said, “the Einstein of his time.” But before he surveyed the sky, he was a prolific musician.

multimedia.caption: William Herschel (1738-1822) discovered Uranus, infrared radiation and moons of Saturn. But until he was 44, he was also a tireless freelance musician.
William Herschel (1738-1822) discovered Uranus, infrared radiation and moons of Saturn. But until he was 44, he was also a tireless freelance musician.

title: Beyoncé’s ‘Break My Soul’ and the Long Tail of ‘Show Me Love’
abstract: The ubiquitous 1992 remix of Robin S.’s song has endured in samples and covers. Its writers’ names appeared in the credits for Beyoncé’s track, were quickly removed and then restored again.

multimedia.caption: The first single from Beyoncé’s upcoming album, “Renaissance,” is a clubby track called “Break My Soul.”

title: Documenting India’s Distinctive Birdhouses
abstract: For seven years, a photographer based in Delhi has collected images of ornamental structures known as chabutras. Here are some of his favorites.
